code: Mandatory: provide a unique code identifying the contact record. Maximum 64 characters
use_by: In this field you can create a date after which the record should not be unlocked any more. Use ISO8601 format.
source: With this field you can specify where the record came from. Maximum of 64 characters
contact_type: CiviCRM contact type: Individual, Organizsation or Household
organization_name: Name of the organisation. Only used for contact_type Organization
household_name: Name of the household. Only used for contact_type Household
first_name: Contact first name. Only used for contact_type Individual
last_name: Contact last name. Only used for contact_type Individual
formal_title: Contact formal title. Only used for contact_type Individual
prefix_id: Contact prefix as the value of CiviCRM's individual prefix option. Only used for contact_type Individual.
suffix_id: Contact suffix as the value of CiviCRM's individual suffix option. Only used for contact_type Individual.
gender_id: Contact gender as the value of CiviCRM's individual genderx option. Only used for contact_type Individual.
birth_date: Contact birth date in ISO8601 format. Only used for contact_type Individual
job_title: Contact job title/function. Only used for contact_type Individual
country_id: Address country as ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code
